underlying_goal: Fix real-time image updates so new images appear without page refresh after iteration, and improve light mode UI styling for the concepts section
friction_detail: Multiple attempts to fix real-time image display all failed, including introducing a runtime TypeError, while the light mode styling required three attempts before user was satisfied.
brief_summary: User wanted real-time image updates to work and light mode styling fixed; styling was eventually fixed but the core image refresh bug was never resolved despite multiple attempts and even introduced a new error.
